text: Tampines branch staff very sincere. Special mention goes to vivian for her supple head & shoulder massage : a great bonus to hair pampering
Very happy with their service esp about hair specialist Kelly is so good, patience and polite...very professional too..thanks to Kelly and oriental hair solutions tampines 1.

Attentive service with no hardselling. Have a package here now because the missus decided I  should take care of my hair and scalp.

Serves tea and biscuits while having treatment so that's a plus. Just learnt that we should try to wash our hair with cold water to protect the scalp and hair..

Been with oriental hair solutions for more than 1 year. Elaine who assisted me was very consistent her good service and that was the reason I came back for more treatments as well. Elaine was very patient and professional. The rest of the staff were good too. Highly recommended!

Feeling Good and relaxing in Oriental Hair Solutions, and I'm glad to know Kelly, she did an amazing arts work...here all the people's more friendly and helpful... i can't wait for my next appointment...love it ❤️
